title: 534 11th Avenue
Reason(s) for removal: Property owner applied for removal permit (788366); garage extension widening into tree 1, tree 2 is on top of sewer which cannot be accessed, addition to the home also triggers tree planting however, there is no room for a street tree due to utilies and proximity to neighboring tree; total of three in-lieu fees to be paid (for loss of tree 1 and tree 2, and for new tree that cannot be planted)

title: 95 Brady Street
Reason(s) for removal: Dying. desiccated; will be replaced unless underground utilities are found

title: 530 Valley Street
Reason(s) for removal: Tree has severe lean to property side, root flair damage and cambium death on steet side, evidence of fungal infection as indicated by white fruiting body at base of tree, significant sidewalk damage; will be replaced

title: 401X Mission Rock Street (98 Mission Rock Street)
Reason(s) for removal: Removal permit for construction (788713); removal of this tree is required to install an underground PG&E line that will replace an existing PG&E overhead line that is currently obstructing the ability to complete the new five-acre China Basin Park on the waterfront across from Oracle Park. This park will contain approximately 150 new trees. Contractor will attempt to replant/re-establish this tree near its current location, specifically to the west approximately 5’. More information on the Mission Rock Development and China Basin Park can be found here: https://missionrock.com/a-shared-vision/
